flawed_nl_solution:
Alice was able to stack 27 + 37 = <<27+37=64>>64 plates she already stacked.
The tower crashes when there are 83 plates - 64 plates already stacked = <<83-64=20>>20 plates she was able to stack before the tower crashed.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
